name: Citadel
description: A towering citadel serves as the ultimate defensive position and seat of authority, offering maximum security but also isolation from the common people. The concentration of power creates opportunities for political intrigue, while the defensive focus can make it a target for siege or infiltration.
atmosphere: Military drills, political activity rustle, and guard vigilance create authority and control atmosphere. Air carries stone, authority, and concentrated political might weight scent. Concentration of power creates political intrigue and advancement opportunities. Defensive focus creates security and isolation atmosphere. Towering structure creates majesty and authority sense. Isolation from common people creates elitism and control feeling.
